children.value: Recently, I start to discover the common practice for web design and web development. I find that almost all the articles about web design talk about how it looks like, but don't talk about how to make the implementation. I did some work to summarize the common pratice for header and sidebar in the view of web design also of web development.

frontmatter.title: Common practice for header and sidebar in web design and development
